definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
to flaunt a skill/to give display to one's ability/to show off a feat/to vaunt one's tricks

sentences.chinese: 面向对象说话的思想本事。

sentences.english: He must exert himself to subdue so proud a display of resentment .
sentences.chinese: 他必须施展本事，征服这种因忌恨而产生的骄傲。

sentences.english: Take out your true skill, to the ground that you use violence.
sentences.chinese: 拿出你的真本事，给你用武之地。

sentences.english: But we gotta see what he's got.
sentences.chinese: 但是我们得看看他的真本事。

sentences.english: It was good to know I had not yet lost all my tricks.
sentences.chinese: 我还没有失去所有的本事，这很好。

sentences.english: It takes more than good memory to have good memories.
sentences.chinese: 不忘本需要比好的记忆力更好的本事。

sentences.english: Okay, collar boy, let's see what you got.
sentences.chinese: 好的，衣领小子，让我们看看你有什么本事。

sentences.english: Do you have any special skills that you could use to earn a better living?
sentences.chinese: 您还有没有什么特别的本事能让你过上更好的生活？

sentences.english: Whoever judges people with their appearance always underestimates others.
sentences.chinese: 不少人喜欢以貌取人，那样其实低估了人家的真本事。

sentences.english: But it cannot walk on water.
sentences.chinese: 但它还没有在水上行走的本事。

sentences.english: Only when doing things alone can he show his paces.
sentences.chinese: 只有单干的时候他才能显露出自己的真本事。

sentences.english: I psyched it all out by  myself and decided.
sentences.chinese: 凭自己的本事此事我全料到了，而且做出了决定。

sentences.english: It was only the die-hards who stayed to see the end of the poor movie.
sentences.chinese: 只有那些死硬派才有本事把这部烂片看完。

sentences.english: For barefaced lying you are really it.
sentences.chinese: 就无耻造谣之本事而论，你真算得上天下第一。

sentences.english: Dr. Jean Grey Actually I'm telekinetic. I can move things with my mind.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，我有隔空移物的本事，我能用意念移动东西。

sentences.english: He says that he hasn't ever shown his paces.
sentences.chinese: 他说他从来没有显露出自己的真本事。

definition: a couple of times/to repeat the same/the same old trick/tricks of the trade
to yield interest, profit etc/to exhale (Buddhism)
solid learning/real ability and learning/genuine talent
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
to have real skill/to know one's stuff
eyesight/strength of vision/the ability to make discerning judgments
proficiency in a particular field (idiom)/skill in a specialized area (idiom)
